properties.entry: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_SEQ, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_MODIFY, REVIEW_GRADE, CHALL_NO, REVIEW_STATUS, USER_ID, NICKNAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_RID.NEXTVAL, ?, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ?, ? )

SELECT USER_ID, CHALL_NO, CHALL_STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE, CHALL_TITLE, FILE_PATH, CHALL_PERIOD, CHALL_START FROM(SELECT CS.USER_ID, CHALL_NO, CS.CHALL_STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE, CHALL_TITLE, FILE_PATH, CHALL_PERIOD, CHALL_START, CASE WHEN CHALL_START > SYSDATE THEN 0 WHEN CHALL_START + (TO_NUMBER(CHALL_PERIOD)*7) < SYSDATE THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS STATUS FROM CHALL_STATUS CS JOIN CHALL USING(CHALL_NO) WHERE CS.USER_ID = ? AND CS.CHALL_STATUS != 0 ORDER BY STATUS, JOIN_CALL_DATE DESC)CE WHERE STATUS = 2

SELECT RNUM, REVIEW_SEQ, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_MODIFY, REVIEW_GRADE, CHALL_TITLE, CHALL_NO, REVIEW_STATUS, USER_ID, NICKNAME FROM RLIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RNUM, REVIEW_SEQ, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_MODIFY, REVIEW_GRADE, CHALL_TITLE, CHALL_NO, REVIEW_STATUS, USER_ID, NICKNAME FROM RLIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_ID = ? AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = ?
SELECT RNUM, REVIEW_SEQ, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_MODIFY, REVIEW_GRADE, CHALL_TITLE, CHALL_NO, REVIEW_STATUS, USER_ID, NICKNAME FROM RLIST WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = ? AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_GRADE = ?, REVIEW_CONTENT = ?, REVIEW_MODIFY = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = ?
